dmca.title: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.1800nicebuy.com ; SONY TV
dmca.body:
Please note that the URL referenced in your DMCA notice does not reside
within our network as of 4:50:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on August 17, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet

 


________________________________

From: Stephany Santos [mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, August 17, 2006 3:32 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.1800nicebuy.com ;
SONY TV
Subject: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.1800nicebuy.com ; SONY TV



To whom it may concern,

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you
regarding your client www.1800nicebuy.com <http://www.1800nicebuy.com/>
and our client Sony Tv. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification
informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and
trademarked logos. They received this letter on 7/13/06  and was given
eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am
showing your client has yet to comply. This notice was also sent to you
on 7/3/06  please find these letters attached and please provide me with
a follow-up on this by 7/21/06. If you have any questions please do not
hesitate to contact me via email at (stephany@netenforcers.com
<mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com> ) 

 

 

 

Stephany Santos
LMS Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc. 
stephany@netenforcers.com <mailto:youremailaddress@netenforcers.com>  
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
dmca.principal_name: Net Enforcers, Inc. (for www.1800nicebuy.com and Sony TV)
